divs: sighting detailsmy friend and i were on a swing in his backyard, when he pointed out a cigar shaped object speeding from south to north in the johnson's ferry\ shallowford area. it was just below the cumulus clouds and even then looked fairly small. probably between 40 to 60 feet long. the craft was white\slightly metallic. if you have any questions please email me @ psearchery@hotmail.com
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Roswell
There were no other sightings in Roswell on or around October 7th 2007
Summary: UFO flew at a low speed for approximately 2 minutes, then disappeared.
